snippet.title: Forgotten Skies - Early Access indie game now Available!
snippet.description:
#forgottenskies #letsplay #indiegame #steam #earlyaccess #gameplay #gaming #gamingvideos #gamers 

Watch the Gameplay impressions of Forgotten Skies!

Check out the gameplay for the highly anticipated release of our indiegame "Forgotten Skies". Dive into an exciting world of action, adventure and stunning graphics in this mix of a platfomergame and action-adventure. View the beautiful gameplay footage showing off some of the game's exciting features and content. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Forgotten Skies is available on Early Access on Steam

▶️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2943550/Forgotten_Skies/
